main event: A UFO was observed in the sky over Painesville, Ohio on August 6, 1959.
interesting points: The object moved very slowly from west to east across the sky, appearing to oscillate from side to side.
The object was larger than a star and shone with a white light.
It did not leave any vapor trail and its motion did not appear to be that of an aircraft.
The observer believed the object may have been a UFO.
sighted object: a slowly moving, oscillating white light in the sky
